collection_holder_name: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections
pageContext.collection_description: Contains two pamphlets entitled "Farm Radio Programs: WEAI, 1930," published by the New York State College of Agriculture at Cornell University, and "Twenty Years of Broadcasting, 1925-1945, 1947," by Charles L. Taylor, a transcript of "Radio Station Development, Cornell University" by Elmer S. Phillips and bound volumes of Farm Radio Program quarterly issues, 1930-1944.
